column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Atmosphere was nice and my review can only speak on the food I got which was the vegetarian ramen and the dry noodle bowl and it just wasn't good. Our shishito peppers where too salty and not very flavorful
column2: my ramen lacked flavor and the dry noodle just tasted weird like spicy and slightly pungent. I would not recommend either. I can't even convince my partner to go back so we can try other things... Service was fine
column3: the tables are small and a bit cramped. There is a large table in the middle for large parties i presume i am not sure if they take reservations. It's very easy to park in this area though there is a parking garage.
